about_the_game:
Monster Racing League is a multiplayer combat racing game where you don’t have to steer. Harness the power of your monsters to attack and defend your way to the finish line. It's chaos, mayhem, and non-stop fun all rolled into one!




Gameplay - Driving Done Differently
Monster Racing League is not your usual racing game! In Monster Racing League the driving is streamlined and the focus is on combat. Select your monster and equip your abilities and boosters before each race. Control your position on the track and strategically play your offensive and defensive abilities against your monster rivals. Abilities have cooldown and recharge times so make sure you choose the right boosters for maximum impact! Master your racing skills with finer control using nitro, braking and steering (coming soon).

Get in on the action with races contested over short, multi rounds of mayhem with up to 10 players. The monster with the most points at the end takes home the glory! Rack up Knucklebones as you compete, unlocking new monsters and upgrades along the way.




Experience the thrill of Monster Racing League with friends! Compete in online multiplayer lobbies or host your own games and invite your pals. With practice mode available, train against a variety of in-house monsters and hone your skills.

Monsters
Monsters are your drivers.
Each monster comes with its own set of unlockable abilities and upgrades. Collect more monsters to access a wider range of awesome abilities and boosters.



Unleash your inner collector with Monster Racing League's highly customisable monsters! Drawing inspiration from designer vinyl toys, each monster is a desirable item that you'll want to add to your collection. Configure the look of your monsters through extensive customisation options including helmets, horns, faces, armour, colours, cars and many more. Get ready to create your ultimate monster driving team!

For the ultimate collectors out there, don't miss out on the Premium Monster Supporters Pack, featuring exclusive materials and unlocked abilities that will stand out on the track. Look out for more themed monster item packs coming soon, all available as Steam DLC.



Tracks
Monster Racing League is also about the tracks. With unique features and themes, each one is a wild ride of its own. Different tracks can match different monsters' abilities, strategies and play styles. So if you want to come out on top, you’ll need to learn the twists and turns of each one. Right now, there are two kinds of tracks, multi-lap loop tracks and point-to-point sprints, but lookout for some more hectic rides coming soon.

Streaming
Gear up for Monster Racing League! It's the perfect game for both spectators and streamers. Races are short and sweet and packed with non-stop action. In spectator mode (coming soon) you can use custom cameras to capture all the epic moments and share them with your audience. In-game monster taunts are perfect for fueling player rivalries and showboating on the track. Grab some friends and go for a burn, with multiplayer mode you can host your own races and stream to your heart's content!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15+ Catalina or newer
  • Processor: Intel 64bit SSE2, Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play online

name: Monster Racing League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3+, 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play online
